short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly Validate and Visualize Coordinates, No Matter the Order

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GeoSwap is a versatile tool that makes working with geographic coordinates easier and faster. Simply paste your coordinates (latitude, longitude or longitude, latitude) into the GeoSwap extension—no matter the order—and instantly get them validated and displayed on an interactive map.

Whether you're a GIS professional, a map enthusiast, or just someone who occasionally deals with coordinates, GeoSwap simplifies the process of handling geographical data. It's perfect for quickly visualizing points, ensuring accuracy, and converting coordinate formats, all within your browser.

Key Features:
1. Single-input coordinate validation supporting lat,lng and lng,lat.
2. Interactive map to visualize coordinates.
3. Quickly copy the exact coordinate you need.
4. Convert to DMS format as well!

Stay tuned for future updates, which will include reverse geocoding, bulk uploads, advanced preferences, and more powerful features to streamline your geospatial work.
